value.name: One year after George Floyd’s death, what’s changed for HR?

value.name: Officer suspended for remark after Indiana police killed man
value.description: Hours later, Indianapolis police officers fatally shot another black man, 19-year-old McHale Rose. In between those two shootings, an officer fatally struck a pregnant woman with his car.

value.description: This week marks one year since Dreasjon Reed and McHale Rose were shot and killed by Indianapolis Metropolitan Police Department officers. Dreasjon Reed’s mother Demetree Wynn spoke to the crowd ...
